body.p:
Union City Tenn
June 2nd 1861
To His Excellency
B Magoffin Govr of Ky
Dear Sir
This will introduce you to my friend CaptLf Cobb who will deliver you sundry dispatches from , as well as to lay before you business of his own
I Commend Capt Cobb to your Confidence & esteem as a Man of ability & patriotism and ask for him any Civilities it May be in your Excellencies power to bestow

I have the honor to be your
Excellencies obt Servt
Jno M Johnson
